code: import React from"react";import"./Profile.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=_ref=>{let{user,handleLogout}=_ref;if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"profile-loading",children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile-avatar",src:user.photo,alt:"User Avatar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"profile-name",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"profile-email",children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"profile-logout-btn",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]});};export default Profile;
